column1: Phase 2
Story Title
Users can easily see which comics influenced each TV Show or Movie as well as the relevant characters and actors associated with them
Users can easily see which actors play which characters and which movies and tv shows they star in
From the homepage, users can instantly and easily understand what our entire website is about
Users can read about each author of the website as well as what the author contributed to
User can expect a clearly organized and aesthetically pleasing website with all Marvel information
Users can see how we got the website's data by clicking on the links that direct to the used RESTful APIs
Upon clicking on a model, users can expect a grid formation of all documented instances
Users can see all attributes of a particular instance on that instance's page
User can see a mocked out API on Apiary
Phase 1
From every page,  users can easily navigate to and from different models
Deploy onto GCP and make sure everything works
Write technical report
Identify the common attributes of data &  ensure each data has a value for attribute
Collect data of 3 instances of each model from at least 2 sources via RESTful API
Create about page & fill it with static info
Edit template by adding separate pages per model
Select template with Bootstrap
Get domain name from nameCheap.com
Set up accounts like GitHub, Slack, Trello, Apiary and GCP
Plan models & attributes for everything
